insights.populationGrowth: Stable 0.8% with agricultural focus and moderate development.
insights.educationLevel: Moderate 77% literacy in rural agricultural setting.
insights.employmentPattern: Agriculture 58%, forestry 15%, small industry 12%, government 10%, services 5%.

insights.temperature: Subtropical, mild winters (14°C), hot summers (33°C). Diverse elevation zones.
insights.precipitation: High 2,400mm with severe monsoon impacts and flooding risks.
insights.seasonality: Mild winter, hot pre-monsoon, destructive monsoon, humid recovery period.
insights.extremeEvents: Severe flooding, landslides, crop destruction, infrastructure damage.

recentEvents.impact: Major crop losses, rural livelihoods affected

preparedness.reliefCapacity: Low - Rural area with limited infrastructure
